description: Replacement of existing UPVC framed double-glazed sash window AND timber framed single-glazed sash window units with specialist antiligature/ anti-absconsion / anti-vandal "Safevent External Slider" secure window units by Britplas Commercial Ltd; to all Service User facing areas of the nine number accumulative Clinical Inpatient Ward facilities situated across the ground and first floor levels of the Gresham House, Tyson House, and Fitzmary House buildings; Bethlem Royal Hospital, Monks Orchard Road, Beckenham, Kent, BR3 3BX
